name: Lost Slime
description:
A Global Game Jam Online Latvia 2021 game.
See the credits and source here: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/lost-slime-1

You play as Mr. Slime. You were out, picking berries for the dessert you will have at the dinner, but, in your absent mind did not notice that the sun went down.

Now the monster-plants and adventurers come out to hunt for XP. And there's no better source of XP than Slimes.

Grab the torch, look for clues in the bushes, avoid monster-plants and adventurers. Find your way home, and try to make it in time for dinner!
